item.title: Dumped mattress, sofa & wooden set of drawers, 29th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Close, Greater London

item.title: Call the police, 29th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sidworth Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Highway workers dumped waste, 29th January
item.description:
The highway workers who replaced the pavement here have littered the entire area with polystyrene balls, pushing a lot into this area but I have found them over 100m on every direction. Previously reported weeks ago, falsely told it was resolved

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chevet Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken kids play area, 29th January
